title: Going To The Hairdresser | LBB Songs | Learn with Little Baby Bum Nursery Rhymes - Moonbug Kids

json.text:
Is your hair too long or really messed up?
Then it's probably time for a hair cut!

You can go to the barbers or a salon
Some have a hair dresser coming to their home!

"snip, hair, hair, snip"
"snip, hair, hair, snip"

It's brilliant fun sitting in the special chair
No need to worry when they cut your hair!

The chair goes up and then goes down!
And you get to wear a hair cutting gown

"snip, hair, hair, snip"
"snip, hair, hair, snip"

Snip go the scissors then comb through your hair
Then snip some more, "A bit more there!"

After the hair cut, you'll look like new!
You'll look very smart, this is really true!

"snip, hair, hair, snip"
"snip, hair, hair, snip"
